review: I like almost everything about the Fire TV. There is just one thing that is disappointing. The MLB.tv app, that I dearly wanted to be able to use wireless, will not work properly. I consistently get "buffering". I checked the Amazon site for others that may have found the same issue and had a solution for it. There is no solution. I don't know who developed the app, but it fails terribly on the Fire TV. The app works on my PC and on my iPad perfectly and is completely wireless. I had to hardwired from my broadband router to the Fire TV to get it to work. Lucky that my router wasn't too far from the Fire TV, otherwise I would have had to return the Fire TV and missed out on all of the other really good applications.
author: William J Bridges Jr
